page.title: 16AIRPORT
page.content: THE AIRPORT EMPLOYES 2,500 PEOPLE AT PRESENT. THE AIRPORT IS SITUATED IN THE CENTRE OF ENGLAND VERY CLOSE TO THE N.E.C,INTERNATIONAL RAILWAY STATION,M6,M42 AND OTHER MOTORWAYS.THE LONGEST FLIGHT FROM THE AIRPORT IS TO TORONTO IN CANADA. A JUMBO JET 747 IS THE BIGGEST PLANE OPERATING FROM THE AIRPORT. THE MAIN RUNWAY IS 7,400ft LONG,THE SMALLER CROSS RUNWAY IS 4,000ft LONG. SO THAT AIROPLANES CAN TAKE OFF MORE QUICKLY A NEW TAXI-WAY HAS BEEN BUILT ALONGSIDE THE MAIN RUNWAY. TO PREVENT NOISE FROM PLANES DISTURBING RESIDENTS IN MARSTON GREEN, A LARGE NOISE BARRIER HAS BEEN BUILT. THIS HAS BEEN LANDSCAPED WITH TREES AND SHRUBS SO THAT IT LOOKS PLEASANT. A SMALL NOISE BARRIER HAS BEEN BUILT BETWEEN THE TERMINAL BUILDING AND HOUSES IN MARSTON GREEN.
